body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24455](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24455) (refactor: Split ArgsManager out of util/system by Empact)
* [#23417](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23417) (wallet, spkm: Move key management from DescriptorScriptPubKeyMan to wallet level KeyManager by achow101)
* [#22341](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22341) (rpc: add getxpub by Sjors)
* [#20205](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20205) (wallet: Properly support a wallet id by achow101)
* [#15112](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15112) (build: Optionally enable -Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
